verbs.description: [ARG0: it] [V: feels] [ARG1: like the flu] but is n't the adenovirus has many of the flu telltale symptoms but is rarely tested by doctors leaving patients miserably sick until it passes pneumonia influenza bronchitis

[ARG1: it] feels like the flu but [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [ARG2: the adenovirus has many of the flu telltale symptoms but is rarely tested by doctors leaving patients miserably sick until it passes pneumonia influenza bronchitis]

it feels like the flu but is n't [ARG0: the adenovirus] [V: has] [ARG1: many of the flu telltale symptoms] but is rarely tested by doctors leaving patients miserably sick until it passes pneumonia influenza bronchitis

it feels like the flu but is n't the adenovirus has many of the flu telltale symptoms but [V: is] rarely tested by doctors leaving patients miserably sick until it passes pneumonia influenza bronchitis
